trans-unit.source: Enables the sharing of contextual information, such as property validation, parent activity, and so on, across validators during the compilation process.
trans-unit.target: Abilita la condivisione di informazioni contestuali, ad esempio la convalida delle proprietà, attività padre e così via, per i validator durante il processo di compilazione.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the ValidationManager class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Per un elenco dei valori iniziali delle proprietà riguardanti un'istanza della classe ValidationManager, vedere il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> class using the identified service provider.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"> </xref> classe utilizzando il provider di servizi identificato.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco dei valori iniziali delle proprietà riguardanti un'istanza del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>classe, vedere il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that locates a GUID identified service.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.IServiceProvider>che consente di individuare un servizio identificato da GUID.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> class using the identified service provider and indicates whether child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"> </xref> classe utilizzando il provider di servizi identificato e indica se figlio <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> devono essere convalidate classi.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco dei valori iniziali delle proprietà riguardanti un'istanza del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>classe, vedere il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that locates a GUID identified service.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.IServiceProvider>che consente di individuare un servizio identificato da GUID.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to validate the child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per convalidare l'elemento figlio <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> classi dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the stack object that a validator can use to make information available to nested validators.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica l'oggetto stack che un validator può utilizzare per rendere disponibili informazioni alle convalide annidate.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> that a validator can use to make information available to nested validators.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"> </xref> che un validator può utilizzare per rendere disponibili informazioni ai validator annidati.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto di servizio specificato <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the <xref:System.Type> of service object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che specifica il <xref:System.Type>dell'oggetto servizio da recuperare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto servizio del tipo serviceType , o un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic) se non è presente alcun oggetto servizio di tipo serviceType .

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of validators that are associated with a type by looking up the validator attribute applied on the type.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una matrice di validator associati a un tipo cercando l'attributo di convalida applicato al tipo.

trans-unit.source: If the hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes contains the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, an array of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se la tabella hash di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>contiene le classi di <xref:System.Type>indicato da `type`, una matrice di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>classi viene restituito.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>

trans-unit.source: If the hash table does not contain the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, a new hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is created and then an array of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se la tabella hash non contiene il <xref:System.Type>indicato da `type`, una nuova tabella hash di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>classi viene creato e quindi una matrice del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>classi viene restituito.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> class to find.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"> </xref> classe da trovare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"> </xref> classi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se figlio <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> devono essere convalidate classi.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se figlio <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> classi devono essere convalidata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
